title: Charge-4e superconductivity from pair-density-wave order in certain high-temperature superconductors
title_cn: 某些高温超导体中成对密度波次的电荷4e超导
abstract: A number of spectacular experimental anomalies have been discovered recently in certain cuprates, notably La2−xBaxCuO4 and La1.6−xNd0.4SrxCuO4, which show unidirectional spin and charge order (known as stripe order). We have recently proposed to interpret these observations as evidence for a new ‘striped’ superconducting state, in which the superconducting order parameter is modulated in space, such that its average is precisely zero. Here, we show that thermal melting of the striped superconducting state can lead to a number of unusual phases, of which the most novel is a charge-4e superconducting state, with a corresponding fractional flux quantum h c=4e. These are never-before-observed states of matter, which, moreover, cannot arise from the conventional Bardeen–Cooper–Schrieffer mechanism. Thus, direct confirmation of their existence, even in a small subset of the cuprates, could have much broader implications for our understanding of high-temperature superconductivity. We propose experiments to observe fractional flux quantization, which could confirm the existence of these states.
abstract_cn: 最近在某些铜酸盐中发现了许多引人注目的实验异常，特别是La 2＆＃8722; x Ba x CuO 4 和La 1.6＆＃8722; x Nd 0.4 Sr x CuO 4 ，显示单向自旋和电荷顺序（称为条纹顺序）。我们最近建议将这些观察结果解释为新的“条带化”证据。超导状态，其中超导阶数参数在空间中进行调制，以使其平均值精确为零。在这里，我们表明，带状超导状态的热融化会导致许多异常相，其中最新颖的是电荷4e超导状态，其相应的分数通量量子h c = 4e。这些是前所未有的物质状态，而且不能从常规的Bardeen＆Cooper＆Schrieffer机制中产生。因此，直接确认它们的存在，即使是一小部分的铜酸盐，也可能对我们对高温超导性的理解产生更广泛的影响。我们建议进行实验以观察分数通量量化，以证实这些状态的存在。

title: Topology-driven quantum phase transitions in time-reversal-invariant anyonic quantum liquids
title_cn: 时变不变的非调子量子液体中的拓扑驱动量子相变
abstract: Indistinguishable particles in two dimensions can be characterized by anyonic quantum statistics, which is more general than that of bosons or fermions. Anyons emerge as quasiparticles in fractional quantum Hall states and in certain frustrated quantum magnets. Quantum liquids of anyons show degenerate ground states, where the degeneracy depends on the topology of the underlying surface. Here, we present a new type of continuous quantum phase transition in such anyonic quantum liquids, which is driven by quantum fluctuations of the topology. The critical state connecting two anyonic liquids on surfaces with different topologies is reminiscent of the notion of a ‘quantum foam’ with fluctuations on all length scales. This exotic quantum phase transition arises in a microscopic model of interacting anyons for which we present an exact solution in a linear geometry. We introduce an intuitive physical picture of this model that unifies string nets and loop gases, and provide a simple description of topological quantum phases and their phase transitions.
abstract_cn: 二维的不可分辨粒子可以用比玻色子或费米子更普遍的非离子量子统计来表征。任何子都以准粒子的形式出现在分数量子霍尔态和某些受挫的量子磁体中。任何原子的量子液体都具有简并的基态，简并性取决于下层表面的拓扑。在这里，我们提出了一种在这种非离子量子液体中的新型连续量子相变，它是由拓扑的量子涨落驱动的。连接具有不同拓扑结构的表面上的两种非离子液体的临界状态使人联想到“量子泡沫”的概念。在所有长度范围内都有波动。这种奇异的量子相变出现在相互作用的任意子的微观模型中，为此我们提出了线性几何中的精确解。我们介绍了该模型的直观物理图像，该图像统一了弦网和回路气体，并提供了拓扑量子相及其相变的简单描述。</ p>

title: Room-temperature ferromagnetism in graphite driven by two-dimensional networks of point defects
title_cn: 二维点缺陷网络驱动的石墨中的室温铁磁性
abstract: Understanding the mechanism of ferromagnetism in carbon-based materials, which contain only s and p electrons in contrast to traditional ferromagnets based on 3d or 4f electrons, is challenging. Here, we demonstrate direct evidence for ferromagnetic order locally at defect structures in highly oriented pyrolytic graphite (HOPG) with magnetic force microscopy and in bulk magnetization measurements at room temperature. Magnetic impurities have been excluded as the origin of the magnetic signal. The observed ferromagnetism has been attributed to originate from localized electron states at grain boundaries of HOPG, forming two-dimensional arrays of point defects. The theoretical value of the magnetic ordering temperature based on weak interlayer coupling and/or magnetic anisotropy is comparable to the experimental value. The unusual chemical environment of defects bonded in graphitic networks can reveal the role of the s and p electrons, creating new routes for spin transport in carbon-based materials.
abstract_cn: 与传统的基于3d或4f电子的铁磁体相比，了解仅包含s和p电子的碳基材料中的铁磁性的机理具有挑战性。在这里，我们通过磁力显微镜和室温下的大块磁化强度测量来证明高取向热解石墨（HOPG）的缺陷结构处局部铁磁有序的直接证据。排除了磁性杂质作为磁性信号的来源。观察到的铁磁性归因于HOPG晶粒边界处的局部电子态，形成了点缺陷的二维阵列。基于弱层间耦合和/或磁各向异性的磁有序温度的理论值与实验值相当。石墨网络中键合的缺陷的异常化学环境可以揭示s和p电子的作用，从而为碳基材料的自旋运输创造了新的途径。

title: Emergent crystallinity and frustration with Bose–Einstein condensates in multimode cavities
title_cn: 玻色-爱因斯坦凝聚物在多模腔中的结晶性和挫折性
abstract: We propose that condensed-matter phenomena involving the spontaneous emergence and dynamics of crystal lattices can be realized using Bose–Einstein condensates coupled to multimode optical cavities. It is known that, in the case of a transversely pumped single-mode cavity, the atoms crystallize at either the even or the odd antinodes of the cavity mode at sufficient pump laser intensity, thus spontaneously breaking a discrete translational symmetry. Here we demonstrate that, in multimode cavities, crystallization involves the spontaneous breaking of a continuous translational symmetry, through a variant of Brazovskii’s transition, thus paving the way for realizations of compliant lattices and associated phenomena, such as dislocations, frustration, glassiness and even supersolidity, in ultracold atomic settings, where quantum effects have a dominant role. We apply a functional-integral formalism to explore the role of fluctuations in this correlated many-body system, to calculate their effect on the threshold for ordering, and to determine their imprint on the correlations of the light emitted from the cavity.
abstract_cn: 我们提出，可以使用耦合到多模光学腔的Bose爱因斯坦凝聚物来实现涉及晶格自发出现和动力学的凝聚态现象。已知在横向泵浦单模腔的情况下，原子在足够的泵浦激光强度下在腔模的偶数或奇数波腹处结晶，从而自发地打破了离散的平移对称性。在这里，我们证明，在多模腔中，结晶涉及Brazovskii跃迁变体的连续平移对称性的自发破裂，从而为实现顺应性晶格和相关现象（例如位错，受挫，在量子效应起主要作用的超冷原子环境中具有玻璃光泽度甚至超固体。我们应用功能积分形式主义来探索波动在这个相关的多体系统中的作用，计算波动对订购阈值的影响，并确定波动对从腔体发出的光的相关性的影响。
